titleStmt.title: The Ballad of the cloak, or, The Cloaks knavery to the tune of From hunger and cold, or, Packington's pound.

publicationStmt.publisher: Reprinted, corrected, revised, and enlarged, by the author,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Three lines of music at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library and the British Library.
